caption: Reminders Lists
description: Users select which lists from Reminders app to include.

caption: Calendars
description: Users can select which calendars from the Calendars app to show.

caption: Full Access Alert
description: The final step in granting Calendar access.

caption: Full Calendar Access
description: To set and reset full Calendar Access click "None" then click "Full Access"

caption: About (top)
description: The top of the About page, describes the app, lists some features and offers a few tips

caption: Shopping lists
description: Tap the Shopping Bag Icon to view your shopping list from the Reminders app.

caption: The Menu Button
description: The items displayed by the Menu Button.

caption: The App settings page
description: The settings page for the app.

caption: Settings Page (Top)
description: This is where the user sets wake-up time and bedtime and Waketime,

caption: No Events
description: Could be a sign that the app does not have access to the Calendar app.

caption: Calendar Events and Reminders
description: Fully displaying the day's Calendar events and active reminders.

caption: Yesterday's Events
description: Tap the < and > to move forward or back one day at a time. Tap the date between them to return to Today.

caption: Displaying All Reminders in the app
description: You can limit how many Reminnder lists the app uses by selecting Reminders from the menu button and deselecting Reminder lists.
